.. automodule:: obiclean

   :py:mod:`obiclean` specific options
   --------------------------------------   

   .. cmdoption::  -d, --distance   
   
                   Used to specify the maximum distance between to 'close' sequences [default = 1] 

   .. cmdoption::  -s, --sample  
   
                   Filename containing sample descriptions

   .. cmdoption::  -r, --ratio  
   
                   minimum ratio between count to be considered as an error [default = 1]

   .. cmdoption::  -H, --head  
   
                   look for head corresponding sequence [default = False]
